name: The Black Cat
description:
This is my team's 1st project in our casual game production class: The Black Cat

The Black Cat is a 2D Platforming Adventure, which sees your soul get resurrected by the luck of a black cat. 

Use your Whip and 9 lives to take revenge on the monsters that killed you and your wife a year earlier and sent you to your grave. 

Will you be able to get revenge or will you fall victim to the monster's wrath once again?

Play on Itch.io or View Gameplay Trailer on YouTube! 

Thank you for reading! Any feedback is appreciated!
